block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Acquired 1B Chris Richard and RHP Mark Nussbeck from the St. Louis Cardinals for RHP Mike Timlin and cash. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Optioned RHP Tim Drew to Buffalo of the International League. Designated RHP Jaime Navarro for assignment.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Acquired 1B Chris Richard and RHP Mark Nussbeck from the St. Louis Cardinals for RHP Mike Timlin and cash. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Optioned RHP Tim Drew to Buffalo of the International League. Designated RHP Jaime Navarro for assignment.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed RHP Stan Belinda. FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed OF Cliff Floyd on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of SS Mendy Lopez from Calgary of the PCL. METS--Activated 3B Robin Ventura from the 15-day disabled list.
National Basketball Association ORLANDO MAGIC--Agreed to terms with G Dee Brown on a one-year contract.

National Football League CHICAGO BEARS--Signed WR Dee Miller. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Claimed S Ray Austin off waivers by the Chicago Bears. GIANTS--Waived CB Jermaine Jones. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Announced the retirement of QB Dave Krieg. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Released WR Darnell McDonald.
National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Agreed to terms with F Scott Pellerin.
JACKSONVILLE--Named Shawn Trent defensive line coach. UPPER IOWA--Named Brian Thiessen sports information director. BAY BUCCANEERS--Released WR Darnell McDonald.
